name: Milk+ Bold Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Firewood, Mahogany Wood, and Marshmallow..Fragrance Description: Milk’s warm notes of Marshmallow, Tonka Bean and Mahogany Wood emblazoned with the unexpected smoky depth of Firewood and Amber. A smoky, sweet and inviting scent to be worn with confidence...About the Bottle: Black with copper foil, the Bold Collection bottles were designed to stand out just as much as the Bold Scent Space perfumes themselves. The plus sign after the fragrance name, such as Milk+, is used to further demonstrate their amplified projection...About the Fragrance: Through Milk+ Bold, I wanted to capture the nostalgia of a fall family vacation spent making s’mores around the fire. The addition of strong bases renders a bolder persona, elevating the scent and exposing the bolder aspects of my memory. –Christelle Laprade, Maker...
ingredients: SD-Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Coumarin, Eugenol, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz one to two times directly on the pulse points, such as your wrists, inner elbows, or sides of the neck. .-Pulse points are warmer areas of the body that act as natural diffusers when emitting a scent..-After application, allow the scent to air dry. .-Rubbing or dabbing will break down a fragrance and cause it to wear off more quickly..-If you wear fragrance on the wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing..-Properly store your bottle to extend its shelf life, including recapping after each use and avoiding direct sunlight... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense...Recycling Instructions: .-While Commodity works toward fully recyclable packaging, most of your fragrance can currently be recycled. .-Box, paper notecard, and pulp tray should be recycled as paper. .-Glass bottle and metal pump should be recycled as glass. .-Cellophane and bottle cap should be thrown in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Scent had grown on me. Super woodsy from the beginning, but dries down into a warmer vanilla. Staple balanced woodsy vanilla scent.

Perfume smelled amazing at first - woodsy, vanilla + spicy, but after a month I noticed the scent changed into a more cinnamon/gingerbread smell. Definitely was a little disappointed because I liked the original smell. Maybe I just got the bottle with a bad formula           smell smell smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful smoky sweet scent! I love a gourmand and this is a 10/10 sweet yet smoky an absolute powerhouse of a fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work in a warehouse and ALLDAY I get asked what I’m wearing. My walk by scent gets them every time! It lasts all day, it smells sweet and strong at the same time! I recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mini perfume inside of a Sephora advent calendar, and to say I’m obsessed is an understatement. It’s giving rich woman. It’s warm, it’s cozy, with a hint of sweetness. I also love that it’s a clean perfume, and I don’t have to worry about ingredients. I would definitely buy this in the bigger bottle.!￼
This is actually the best perfume i’ve ever bought! It’s so warm and woody. It’s so cozy. I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the perfume I get most compliments by FAR. Even had someone who was checking me out at a gas station come in front of the cash register to smell me. So. Good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample from Sephora of this fragrance. Holy moly, I don’t get any of the notes the details mention. I have By the Fireplace and enjoy it; this smells nothing like it. On me, this smells like mentholated Vick’s Vaporub! It made me gag. It takes hours for the smell to dissipate into something pleasant. I’m so glad this was a sample and I didn’t spend a single cent to try this. Maybe it will work better for my partner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this and it smells like a scented pad. Absolutely disgusting and a major turn off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of By The Fireplace it smells so bad! I don't smell anything sweet its very overpowering...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately way too sweet for my taste. Pretty overwhelming to smell. Could definitely come down to personal preference but the spicy notes were not enough to balance out how gourmand this is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's a beautiful gourmand soothing fragrance. I love to use this on an everyday basis. I got an 2ml free sample which is more than the rest fragrance samples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fav new signature scent. has that intoxicating note that keeps me coming back for more whiffs that milk expressive just lacks for me. definitely more heavy on the woody/ambery scent but it adds so much depth and comfort. smells like toasting a marshmallow at the fire, love love love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a vanilla girlie til I die. I only like scents that are perfect, pure, vanilla goodness. some of my favs of all time are vanilla lace, slice of heaven, vanilla skin. this, though! this is amazing. layered and by itself. I put this on and my boyfriend for the first time ever said I smelled good unprompted, the instant he hugged me (and I always smell like cake or something).

reviews.review_title: add phlur caramel skin to this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for early fall and winter. Well if you love layering with this , I have the perfect combo:  PHLUR CARAMEL SKIN , AND PHLUR HEAVY CREAM , And put Commodity Milk bold on top ...masterpiece combination!!  When you mix the 3 , it gives C bold its added lactonic gourmand it some ppl may have wanted and its a heaven combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: obsessed! it's warm, cozy, milky and stays on all day! my new favorite scent. Definitely going to have a permanent spot on my vanity. might even be my new signature scent! I love gourmand scents and this is exactly what a gourmand scent should smell like. beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Blind buy gone good! I really enjoy “By the fireplace” by MM but it lacks the sweetness that this one delivers. This was exactly what I was looking for! Perfect cozy scent. Lasts all day too! Love layering with my vanilla musk oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i found this scent originally on scentbird and i fell in love, it smells like a sophisticated roasted marshmallow on a campfire, its so lovely and its very unisex, if you want a more laidback version i would do milk personal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought the travel size a few months ago and have been wearing it a few times a week since. The way I can describe this is “home-y”. It’s super comforting and cozy. I purchased the full sized bottle a few weeks ago thinking I was smitten with this fragrance but I have yet to open it because I cannot justify the price for the mediocrity of it. Now don't get me wrong, this does smell great! I have received quite a few compliments in a short span of time. But to me, it smells like something I could create by mixing a few other scents that I already own. It's not unique enough for the price. It smells very similar to this cream you kind find at Marshall's called Au Lait for about $7.99 which is oatmeal scented (granted, the lotion scent won't last as long). I've seen someone describe this as smelling like a warm bowl of oatmeal and that's pretty spot on. This DOES indeed last a long time, despite what others are saying. A friend described me as smelling strong and that's with 2 sprays. I can often smell it on me leaving my 10 hour overnight shift at the hospital, as well as other nurses I let sample my travel size. All in all, I'd say to give this a shot via travel size. But as for me, I simply cannot justify $145 plus tax to smell like a warm breakfast staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE IT. It’s the perfect warm, sweet and comforting scent ever. It’s so good I have Milk expressive and Milk bold. Thank you, Commodity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Possibly a defective bottle, but after a week of being open, the scent completely deteriorated and the perfume smells like alcohol or very cheap perfume. I’m super sad, as I was so in love with the scent when the bottle was fresh, but even my husband commented that the scent had just completely changed. For the price tag, I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for a sample, and Imidiatly fell in love!! VERY bold scent, but in a good way. Most needed, 2 sprays. It also lasts for the whole day. It works very well on clothes too!! Highly recommend, very expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes
reviews.review_text: Such an interesting fragrance. It’s reminds me of a warm, spicy bowl of oatmeal in the best possible way. I like thjs so much I really want to try the commodity sampler sets

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was originally going to get Milk Expressive but the Sephora I went to didn’t have it in stock, but with the help of the employees I grabbed this one instead. It smells amazing and has become one of my favorites in my collection!

reviews.review_title: Clean Product with a wonderful smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent on my husband! I love that it’s a clean brand for starters. It has this soft marshmallow scent with a hit of woods and on his skin it comes together perfectly.  together perfect
Love it! It’s long lasting. How I describe it- it takes you in and then it holds you with the sweet notes toward the end. (Crazy description lol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this fragrance several times and it is so lovely,  it just doesn't last on me no matter what. It completely disappears after it dries down, which is so unfortunate because it's such a lovely scent!! I do get whiffs throughout the day but not as strong as it should be to be the bold version. Great for layering!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is like a warm hug. It is so rich and inviting. I love how complex it is! My partner, who is not into perfume at all even digs this one. I can’t believe how multifaceted this scent is. I love the  toasty marshmallow and the vanilla.  The amber really Grounds it and keeps the scent lingering forever. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just received my bottle of Milk+ Bold.   I am absolutely obsessed.  I typically wear Maison Margiela Replica in By the Fireplace.  It’s my go to for fall/winter.  I ordered this on a whim bc it sounded right up my alley.  It is beyond. The scent is truly decadent and I cannot stop smelling it.  So happy I ordered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance!  I have Milk bold and expressive!  Commodity is a genius!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so nice. Stays for a long time. Love how the smell evolves and changes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for the faint of heart. Was searching for something spicy, with staying power. My eldest daughter literally choked when I offered up my wrist to smell. I informed it smelled like chemicals and was off putting like a haze of bug spray. I wore this for an evening to see if it may have just been her, no. I was met with the words, did someone light a citronella candle.  Later, I realized I developed a rash where I sprayed it.   Definitely disappointed 😞.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance this is one of the few full sized bottles I’ve ever gotten and it is so completely worth it. It’s so cozy, addictive, slightly sexy, and SO LONG LASTING. This is my most complimented fragrance and the projection is amazing. If you have. a hard time getting fragrances to last this bold line from Commodity is very well made to last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fallen so hard in love with this I feel inclined to make a review. I feel as though I have missed out on this brand and scent for so long due to reviews leading me astray - it just goes to show how subjective scent is - what smells like perfection to someone can be anothers idea of awful and vice versa. So from now on I will read reviews and take them with a grain of salt. But, in my opinion, this is simply beautiful. I get the warm frothy milk vibe in the opening, then it drys down to gorgeous toasty woods with a hint of roasted marshmallow in the background. I am a gourmand lover; I read this perfume is masculine and cologne like so I stayed away from it. As someone who likes scents like Bianco Latte, Escapade gourmand, blanche bete, delizia di marshmallow, italica, akro bake (you get the picture) , I truly love gourmands and I don't like 'masculine' scents. This to me isn't masculine at all. I do think it's unisex (as could be any scent, really), and not a full blown gourmand, but wow it's beautiful. I also was afraid it would be extremely strong. To be honest, I don't think it projects THAT far nor do I think it's a 'strong scent'. It stays fairly close to the skin, but with that being said it lasts alllll day and then some. I can still smell it on my skin after I shower. The fact that it lasts a long time just makes it even better, I struggle with so many perfumes that have no lasting power and this is one that lasts and lasts, it just isn't overpowering. So glad I tried this, I will try the milk expressive next, hopefully they are noticeably different. <3 feels heavy and I can tell its good quality too. love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveee the smell! As a vanilla girly, this is perfect. It is deep, dark, woody and sweet at the same time. It is like a warm hug. The longevity is great too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely obsessed. this might just be my favourite perfume of all time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the full size version of Milk + Bold after I couldn’t get enough of the travel size expressive version. I do find that the Bold version smells slightly sweeter but just as lovely. This will be my signature daily scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unique, subtly sweet and slightly darker amber. It opens as a a pure milky sweetness, as it dries it mixes with the deep amber and creates a smoked marshmallow essence. Removed one star only because it doesn’t last as long as I’d like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so cozy, the longevity in my skin it’s pretty decent. I Recommend for cold weather. Bonus: Add 1 spritz on the scarf, thank me later.

reviews.review_title: My new favorite fragrance. Super low key
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I see all the reviews from the women perspective but I was recommended this by an employee and I love it. I am a tall black male and I receive compliments on a daily from man and woman. 🔥

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not usually someone who loves sweeter scents but this one blew me away. it smells like roasted marshmallows, by the fire, under a cozy blanket, with a loved one close to you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent will  literally have heads turning. I literally got followed around at work because someone was dying to know what perfume I was wearing. It is the most gourmand laconic warm fluffy, firey marshmallow scent. It last all day long and projects like crazy. People will want to be around you when you wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for Mother’s Day and I am obsessed! This is sweet and warm and smells like roasted marshmallows! This layers well with other fragrances and ands a perfect balance or sweetness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never loved a perfume this much, please never discontinue. It reminds me a bit of by the fireplace but a bit more sweet. I love it so much I honestly want to gate-keep when people ask haha!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m addicted to Milk Bold. I’ve never been a gourmand fan, but this fragrance alone has changed my mind. It’s sweet and warm and woody and perfectly intoxicating. The perfect cozy fall scent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easily one of my favorite Commodity scents, right next to Paper-!! The soft scent of marshmallows and amber just sit so nicely with each other. I got so many compliments when I used the samlle from the exploration kit so naturally I had to get the biggest bottle of it!!!
J’adore se produit! Il est un de mes parfum coup de coeur 🫶🏻 c’est un incontournable pour moi! Je le recommande à 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells comfort in a bottle. This is a beautiful marshmallow fragrance that will get you a lot of compliments. There’s a smoky quality to it that I adore. It’s cozy, woody, amber and creamy.

reviews.review_title: Very surprised that I didn't like this...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE By the Fireplace, so much that I always keep a couple extra bottles on hand.  After reading the description and reviews of this, I couldn't wait to receive it.  I sprayed it on my arm and waited for the dry down.  On me, it comes across as strictly a men's cologne, and not a very good one.  I do get the smokiness (which I generally love) and a tiny bit of sweetness, but it's mainly a smoky sourish smell, at least on me, and absolutely is not something a woman could wear unless you straight up wanted to smell like a man.  I only wear vanilla, marshmallow, campfire, smoky type scents, but the vanilla/sweet/marshmallow needs to be very detectable as well.  Sadly, this one is going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells like comfort to me, woody, creamy, a little sweet. It lasts more then all day on me and I will be wearing it all fall and winter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very similar to the original (expressive strength), but it is SO strong. One spray is more than enough for me, almost too much. That being said, if you love the original and want to get more bang for your buck, this may be for you. It lasts all day and then some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is warm marshmallow goodness. I can picture myself sitting by a fire with a s’more and hot chocolate close by. This is cozy and inviting and perfect for those colder months. Definitely full size worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is what by the fire place should’ve been in my opinion. it’s a smoky marshmallow scent with a woody undertone that turns really sweet on my skin but not cloying. i’ll definitely purchase the full size when i run out of my sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My son purchased this for me as a gift and I love it. This is the second Commodity fragrance I have and it does not disappoint. Warm, smoky, and sweet. I get a ton of compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite like tonic perfume. It has incredible projection, and I feel like I can wear this all throughout the seasons I highly highly recommend trying.

reviews.review_title: The marshmallow fragrance of my dreams!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I’ll be honest, I didn’t know what to think. It starts with a strong campfire smell that initially offended my nose. Luckily, this smell transitions into one of the most beautiful lactonic/marshmallow scents. I love wearing this one on colder days or before sleep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like marshmallows! Which I love! Definitely a gourmand scent and I recommend it in bold

reviews.review_title: An absolute MUST HAVE in every womans life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Milk +BOLD is the absolute best! I love them all but MILK BOLD will be a fragrance I will forever buy! Shout-out to Sephora for providing a sample in Sephora favorites purchase otherwise I'd never known. My all time favorite scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a strong statement. If I wear this perfume, then I am guaranteed a compliment. Everyday I’ve worn this someone has mentioned that I smell amazing. It lasts for ages and I’m gonna definitely get a backup of this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had to return this one unfortunately. I went into the store to test it out & loved the smell originally so I went ahead & bought it. However, as the day went on I wasn't a fan of the dry down scent. It's just a little too woodsy/musky to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Milk+ is an incredibly captivating scent with a warm silage and generous longevity. Tonka, burnt sugar (roasted marshmallow), and mahogany offer a rich body. Amber and campfire are gentle but present.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t u ferry and the hype it was not working for me. It smelled like one of those men’s cologne that you sprayed thinking it was a woman’s sample. No 😑

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didn’t agree with my body chemistry . It smells wonderful, but sadly not on me .
Love this scent. Perfect mix of sweet and spicy for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a no for me. Got it a few days ago but I just used it last night. Took a shower, prepared for bed, sprayed this on the pulse points, as I was doing so my husband said the perfume smelled like smoke. I told him the fragrance had to settle for a bit, maybe. I was inhaling/choking on this smoky odor for atleast 30 minutes before I fell asleep. Woke up about 7 hours later... Still smelled like smoke thought it was a little lighter, no sweetness. I just now put in for a return. Not sure if I'll try any of the other scents in this line...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I get so many compliments on this perfume! Warm, cozy, sweet, smoky vanilla… a fall find from heaven.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw someone review Milk in the expressive form, and I have to agree with them when they said this is more sweet, gourmand, and extremely long lasting. (not smoky, which I love.) and the expressive is more soft and a powdery fragrance. Go with Milk+ if you’re a gourmand fan, and the expressive if you like softer, powdery scent, the expressive is for you! Hopefully this helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not for me. I think it smells too powdery for my tastes. Maybe it's the amber? I prefer by the fireplace, angels share, or EB bee.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gorgeous velvety, vanilla gourmand amber scent that just smells cozy and not too overwhelming. Im always nervous to buy sweet fragrances because many are way too potent and nauseating, but this one is the perfect level of softness that I was looking for for the fall season. If you like soft and sweet scents that can carry throughout a room, this is the perfect fragrance. Don't buy this scent expecting a smokey smell similar to Replica's By the Fireplace, this one is much softer and the smokiness is much less obvious. It makes me love it all the more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has such a unique smell to it. It’s heavy and sweet at the same time. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed. So I am the idiot who blind bought it, okay? I will say I’ve blind bought a few fragrances, angels share and Killians love don’t be shy… but this… smells like mens cologne. I was intrigued by the comments of how people wanted this to smell like “by the fireplace” more sweeter and marshmallow scent. Um no, I smell zero smoke, nothing GOOD. Save your dollars and smell it in store. I’m exchanging this instore for something else. I treated myself to a birthday gift. Yuckkkk

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells absolutely amazing. I blind bought this in a travel size as I'm a fan of By the Fireplace but wanted something slightly sweeter. It smells soooo delicious. Perfect fall/winter scent. I prefer this to By the Fireplace and it lasts a really long time. I'll be buying the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the packaging to the scent this quickly made its way to my heart. it's sweet, sultry, seductive... think cuddling by a fire after roasting s'mores. There is so much depth here, I blind bought this with my personal love of MMM by the fireplace in mind and they are similar but soooo different I find this to be deeper, darker, more mysterious also more unisex and amazing longevity. I loveeee it and im so excited to use this during the fall and colder months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fall/winter scent. Bold but smooth and not overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Like Being Curled Up with Everything Right in the
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy to see Commodity at Sephora! I have been using Milk+ for a little shy of a year, and I cannot wait for cooler weather because it is the perfect Fall/Winter scent. Milk+  is a gourmand dream and every time I smell it, I just want to curl up in its warm and intoxicating goodness! If you haven’t tried Commodity, you absolutely should—they have a discover kit that goes through each of the scent space fragrances. I hope this fragrance stays forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ahhh!! I don’t know if I should be thrilled or bummed that Sephora is carrying Commodity now. Milk + has been one of my favorite fragrances for about a year now. It’s such a unique gourmand and I get so many compliments. I absolutely love it. Only problem is that it’s at risk of becoming overly popular and mainstream now that Sephora carries it. Oh well, I can share:) I just hope the perfume quality stays the same now that it’s being more widely produced!

I see people hating on this scent don’t get me wrong it is very strong and dosent smell the best like super close up on the skin but it smells so good though in the air and on clothes if you like very sweet scents this may not be for you but overall I would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A warm hug in a fragrance. This will be my signature scent as it is the perfect mixture of sweet and woody. It smells expensive. I am prone to migraines but this gives me zero issues! 10/10
